Source.Name: vscode
Source.Summary: Visual Studio Code (open source version) is a new type of tool that combines the simplicity of a code editor with what developers need for their core edit-build-debug cycle.
Source.Description: Visual Studio Code (open source version) is a new type of tool that combines the simplicity of a code editor with what developers need for their core edit-build-debug cycle.
